metadata.title: CVE-2017-11343 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2012-6125, all versions of CHICKEN Schemeup to and including 4.12.0 are vulnerable to an algorithmic complexityattack. An attacker can provide crafted input which, when inserted into thesymbol table, will result in O(n) lookup time.

criterions.comment: chicken package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
